## createT1Theme() function

Creates a T1 theme with ANSI-16 colors.

At T1 level, colors use ANSI color indices (0-15) with no RGB resolution. Transformations are accumulated but not applied until T3 is available.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function createT1Theme(options?: DetectOptions): Theme;
```

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional capability detection options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Theme](./chromaterm.theme.md)

A theme with all standard ANSI colors
